
# Gradient & Edge Operation

- Check [Toturial on Sobel Derivatives](https://docs.opencv.org/3.4.3/d2/d2c/tutorial_sobel_derivatives.html)

- Linear operators can be exchanged:
$$
\begin{align}
  I_x  & = \frac{\partial}{\partial x} \left[ G(\sigma) * I \right] \\
       & = \left[ \frac{\partial}{\partial x}  G(\sigma) \right] * I 
\end{align}
$$
- The gradient of $G(\sigma)$ is approximated in discrete space: Sobel, Prewit, etc.


- Edge magnitude:
$$
\begin{align}
    M & = \big( I_x^2 + I_y^2 \big)^{1/2} \quad \mbox{$L_2$ norm} \\
      & = | I_x | + | I_y | \quad \mbox{$L_1$ norm} \\
      & = \max \{ |I_x|, |I_y|\} \quad \mbox{$L_\infty$ norm}
\end{align}
$$
  - [Norm (mathematics)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Norm_(mathematics))
  - [L0 Norm, L1 Norm, L-Infinity Norm](https://medium.com/@montjoile/l0-norm-l1-norm-l2-norm-l-infinity-norm-7a7d18a4f40c)
